ValidationRule.description: To create a new advice opportunity, the household must be in a status of withdrawn.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = "Advice_Opportunity" && ISNEW() && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Account.FinServ__Status__c, "Withdrawn" )) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(LeadSource, "Child of client - referred")) && ISBLANK( Date_Converted__c ) && $User.Username <> "cian@novawm.com"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can only create a new advice opportunity when the household is withdrawn.
